translations: n.添加剂，食物添加剂；附加剂

sentences.sentence: People can react badly to certain food additives.
sentences.translation: 人们对某些食品添加剂会严重过敏。

sentences.sentence: Strict safety tests are carried out on food additives.
sentences.translation: 对食品添加剂进行了严格的安全检测。

sentences.sentence: Many foods are suspected of being detrimental to health because of the chemicals and additives they contain.
sentences.translation: 许多食物因所含的化学成分和添加剂被怀疑有害健康。
